data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SWIFTSURE cruise from Fayal to Halifax started at 1808-08-17

Ship: Swiftsure (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Fayal - Halifax, 1st Observer: William Rutherford (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Thomas (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 74G 1704BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
